title: Least to Greatest Correlation
question_text:
Order the correlation coefficient value from least to greatest from the given scatterplots.

Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2016. All rights reserved.
solution:
Notice that the question says "least to greatest," not "weakest to strongest." The first graph shows a strong negative linear association (it fits a tight linear pattern).

Therefore, scatterplot
B
is the smallest number since it has the strongest negative correlation. This eliminates Choices 'B', 'C', 'E'.

The next lowest correlation will be the other negative linear association (scatterplot
D
). This, leaves Choice 'A' as the correct answer.
